newsitem.title: USA: Duff puts Renaissance Hotel unit on watch.
newsitem.headline: Duff puts Renaissance Hotel unit on watch.

text.p: Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Wednesday it placed the triple-B-minus rating assigned to RHG Finance Corp, a subsidiary of Renaissance Hotel Group NV (RHG), on rating watch-down.

Duff said the move stems from the proposed acquisiton of RHG by Doubletree Corp in a deal valued at $890 million. Because RHG Finance's $120 million of senior notes due 2005 are unconditionally guaranteed by the parent company, the rating directly reflects the general creditworthiness of RHG, Duff said.
Its shares closed up 1/2 Wednesday at 25-1/4.
